Left4Dead isn't that bad of a game. It's got some great campaigns, has tons of character, is highly replayable, and is the perfect game to scratch that 'Zombie Co-Op' game itch if you haven't already played it.

You can get all of this, plus new campaigns with new characters and weapons, in L4D2. I repeat: you can play all of L4D1 in 2. There isn't that much of a reason to buy this unless you grew up playing it and need that nostalgia fix or something like that. If you want to buy it out of curiosity, buy the bundle when it's on sale. Otherwise, stick with 2.

IIRC this is a Player vs Environment game designed by Turtle Rocks Studio and partly Valve. You and other 3 Survivors need to cooperate your way through the zombie (or infected) horde, and find rescue then escape.

This game has 4 difficulty options, each of them manipulate how good are the items you may get, your damage, the zombie's damage, spawn rates, and other misc tidbits. I play at the highest difficulty most often, which makes zombies very brutal if you let them attack you. Though, I recommend Easy for absolute beginners, Normal for the same beginners who may think Easy is too uneventful, and Advanced for players who developed enough gamesense, but are still beginners.

While fighting the horde of infecteds, there may be special types of infecteds, literally called "Special Infecteds", can potentially ruin your team if given the chance. These Infecteds serve to test the teamwork of you and your teammates, or to see how good your team can readapt. They shine the most when fighting along side a big amount of common infecteds, or they'll be disposed of easily.

There are also two Boss Infecteds: Tank and Witch. The Tank is a really muscular zombie that can absorb a lot of damage, AND down a survivor in just a small amount of swings. While the Witch is a crying woman with really long nails, that gets angered if they feel AND are sure someone noticed them. Angered for too long, and they will chase down their victim.

These are cool and all, but the main attraction is the game's AI Director. The Director is the one who manages what items are allowed to be active in the map, how good the players's items are, when should zombies spawns, where should the zombies spawn (the game uses no set spawn points!) and whatnot. The Director serves to keep the game intense, but also to give players breaks when it feels they need to, as it actively tries to estimate the players's stress level, so they don't get overwhelmed or too tired from the intensity.

Oh yeah, there's also versus mode, but I don't play that. You can play as the zombies though.

Overall, this game is worth your time AND is replayable, but be noted I bought the bundle on the Summer Sale where it costed somewhere around $1.79 USD! (I converted my country's money to this)

Without the Summer Sale, think it costs around $3.49. (actually $23.50?)

But, if you have Left 4 Dead 2, should you get this?

Well, personally, if you are not too intersted in the presentation, your only reason to get Left 4 Dead 1 would be to either re-experience it and have a retrospective. Sure, the L4D1 campaigns are ported to L4D2, but they actually changed some stuff in some campaigns, and some of the things have been changed that alter the atmosphere, such as commons having a different look which looks strange. Mods DO exist, but do you really wanna go through so many hoops and all that to find out everything that changed and fix it, and I also somehow couldn't find a mod that turns back commons to L4D1 look.

Personally, I myself don't really give a damn about graphics or anything like that, but this game, its magical. It got me into appreciating the presentaton. The ambience.... The atmosphere..... Damn. Never have I felt stressed, dreaded / hopeless, on high alert, and thinking about the well-being of my teammates. (unless if they're being the person who plays L4D optimally, of course)

With my friends, we usually end up getting a break moment in one of the saferooms and proceed with something that resembles a campfire discussion. NEVER have a game made me to do any of these, its strangely powerful to me in this aspect...?

Left 4 Dead 2 doesn't really have that, as they went for a more different direction, so the charm and whatnot was lost, but gameplay has of course evolved

Que decir de Left 4 Dead que no se haya escrito ya. El genial juego de acción y zombies de Valve fue una consecuencia inesperada de esas míticas lan partys que montabas con tus colegas allá por los cercanos , y al mismo tiempo lejanos , años 90.

Corria la mitad de los dos mil cuando Turtle Rock Studios, hasta entonces un estudio relativamente desconocido, recibió el encargo de portear y actualizar Counter Strike , tanto para PC como para la primera consola de Microsoft: X-Box. El encargo no fue todo lo fructífero que se esperaba y en la intentona se perdió un prometedor modo historia nuevas armas y elementos para el modo online que chocaban frontalmente con la comunidad ultraconservadora de un juego, que por aquel entonces, mandaba con puño de hierro en las estadísticas de los mas jugado.

De esta manera obtuvimos Counter Strike Condition Zero , una singular actualización de la version 1.6 del juego , con unas escenas para un jugador eliminadas y la posibilidad de , por primera vez, jugar online en consolas.
Sin embargo no todo fue negativo , y es que durante el desarrollo de este juego sus creadores, como recalqué al inicio del texto se divertían organizando lanes en sus estudios. Disfrutaban de aquellos bizarros servidores de zombies, mod del mod que transformaban al juego de acción táctica en toda una locura de supervivencia.

Poco a poco lo que fue un pasatiempo fue cogiendo forma, transformándose en algo mas que una modificación para disfrutarla entre colegas y termino siendo el juego que actualmente conocemos. Y es que Left 4 Dead tiene ya 10 añazos a sus espaldas y sin embargo continua siendo un referente. Gráficos mas que correctos , acción a raudales, escenarios interactivos...todo ello explotando el juego cooperativo y añadiéndole ademas la posibilidad de jugar en VS encarnando a la facción zombie.

Lo mejor:
-Gráficos que aun hoy en día sorprenden: hordas, animaciones, efectos de luz...
-Su genial formato episodio nos cuenta una historia a través de unas campañas presentadas como si se tratase de peliculas.
-Cooperativo muy bien planteado.
-Modo vs que exige una coordinación de equipo brutal.
-Mods y servidores dedicados.

Lo peor:
-Que valve no conozca el numero 3.
-Que no se desarrollen nuevas campañas oficiales ( que personalmente pagaría con gusto )
-Quizás peque de ser algo repetitivo.

关于对中国的友好建议
那些坑完小学生钱就走的游戏遍网全是，你不去整治；那些点开网页全是蹩脚普通话的游戏，你不去整治；那些官网买外挂的游戏，你不去整治。你整治3A大作？暴力？色情？你看看国内到处网页广告上的图，个个都比STEAM裸露，你管都不管，你来管STEAM。你有闲情雅致怎么不去管管中国影视业？发展的比卢本伟还畸形。看看你的CCTV，在看看别人的BBC，差距。你自己建立起来的文化自信又被你自己踩下去，为什么？不革新自身的管理方式，还拖一个大平台下水。STEAM虽然被很多中国玩家当成启动器，但好歹让大家有了正版意识这个观念，好不容易有点进展就要被打回原型，鼓励大家玩盗版？不说所谓民主，为什么不能分级，分级制度就能解决大部分事情，你这样有意思吗？你们这些专家是真的睿智啊。你天天弄这些没有用，干脆就直接把网络什么的都取消，正常人不让用得了，一天组织点什么喊口号种地？？？还是直接回归原始社会得了，

我真正在意的是如果我买的游戏玩不了，我又找谁来赔偿，完美，还是国家？不过估计最后就是让我们这些坚持正版的玩家白白损失一笔，最后有要被一些现实生活中的盗版优越大爷好好嘲讽一下了，睿智啊。厉害了我的国，呵呵。始皇帝啊，这盛世如你所愿。一些人和身边的朋友小时候就在传奇和cs的游戏中长大，也没有谁去砍人杀人犯法，现在的熊孩子看喜羊羊等把其他孩子烤了，到底是游戏动漫的错？还是家庭学校不负责任的教育的错？大家心里都有数.你就这样就脱离了坚持社会主义100年的目标了？中国梦，是什么？好好学习，肉身出墙

游戏属于第九文化，任何一款大作游戏，本身就蕴含着作者思想与道，但对于我国目前还未开放的价值观而言，外国对于未来的思考以及奇特的众多幻想是不能被广电局所接受的。国内游戏就目前而言，有steam和主机各方面的因素，依旧是做个垃圾就能赚的盆满钵满，他们知道游戏本身品质只要勉强过得去，在在游戏里面设计点能装X的“微操”，以及各种各样涩情的原画，各种各样中二的建模和台词就能骗到钱，游戏本身剧情一定要扯，不能有深度，浅显易懂。这样的制作反而比你认认真真想剧情做出来的游戏赚钱得多，steam在国内看起来很多人知道，实际上在绝地求生出来之前你走在大街上根本没几个人知道有steam这个东西


其实中国实名认证已经比国外领先了，银联支付和微信支付都必须得需要身份证，那为什么还迟迟不推出分级政策呢？因为现在是否过审文化部和广电总局是由最高决定权的，没有相关的法律和规定来决定一款游戏是否过审

以前有个国内单机游戏厂商制作了一款武侠游戏去送审，因为是国内厂商，所以对于审查机制是很了解的，在送审前就去掉了血液还有断肢效果，尸体也都变成了黑色的，可就是这样都无法过审，审查机构说这款游戏里的玩家扮演角色在杀人后坐牢十天就可以了，很容易造成一些不好的社会影响，后来改着改着就变成一款只能骑马的武侠游戏了

而腾讯的天涯明月刀在杀死人形敌人之后一点责任都不用负，继续屠杀就可以了，这样造成的社会影响是不是更大呢，可天涯明月刀却过审了
为什么会这样呢，腾讯日进斗金，它交得起钱，而那个小厂商做完游戏就没什么钱了，所以中国单机游戏的发展不是看你制作水平，也不是看你宣传到不到位，是先看你交不交得起钱
而中国相关部门在审查时声称依据是什么呢？就是社会所谓的主旋律，就是社会主义核心价值观
这有点像什么呢？古代君王都会给自己的权力找个合乎于法理的声明，君权神授，我是真龙天子，我的权利都是上天赐给我的，而社会主义核心价值观就是充当了这种用途的工具，给自己不正当不合乎于法理的权利和获得的利益一个看上去合理的声明
香港台湾澳门是特别行政区，他们的社会经济政治文化制度都和大陆不一样，那大家想过为什么会这样吗，其实很简单，回哭的孩子有奶吃，就比如说香港，假如97回归的时候就是大陆制度的话，他们就会大罢工大罢学，让社会不能正常运转，而当时国内外也有很多双眼睛在看着香港，所以他们就是特别行政区
而咱们大陆人呢，封外网的时候，咱们忍受住了，和谐魔兽世界的时候又忍受住了，从来没有为自己的权益发过声，而现在变本加厉，Steam中国版都要出了，最好的结果都是出来个中国版商店，现有国区的支付方式及低价区优惠都转移到上面去，这次还默默忍受的话这次那以后呢，怕不是变成朝鲜光明网了吧


很多人都把这些事情看似是理所应当的，不管是封外网还是和谐游戏，暴走大事件或者是现在的Steam中国版，而事实呢，欧洲在INS啊twitter啊上面有恐怖分子活动，而他们是简简单单的墙了这些社交软件了吗，他们跟这些恐怖分子打网络战，把他们驱逐出了这些社交软件，那既然如此中共为什么不行，就因为墙了低成本吗，我们的权益及我们娱乐休闲的地方还不如打场网络战的成本吗，中国人就要就要妥协隐忍而外国人就能保障自己的权益吗
请大家把这些言论扩散出去
为自己的权益和Steam发声


我不知道哪种被代表更好，一种是他们封禁和谐魔兽世界及暴走大事件等等自由媒体

--Para quem esse jogo foi desenvolvido?
( ) Crianças
( ) Adolescentes
(X) Jovens
( ) Adultos
( ) Tudo e todos
O Tema de Zumbis atrai alguns adolescentes também, porém, definitivamente, o jogo é destinado à jovens+.

--Lindeza?
( ) Parece com os gráficos dos jogos do Atari
( ) Meia boca, tem piores
( ) Dentro da média atual
(X) Bonito
( ) Unico e estilizado
Tendo em vista que é um jogo da década de 2000, tem gráficos acima dos padrões aceitáveis.

--Falhas
(X) Isso é uma falha
( ) Bugs em excesso
( ) Muita falha mas dá pra jogar
( ) Bugs que são legais e não atrapalham
( ) Esse jogo esta perfeito
Existe um bug que simplesmente congela a tela. A única resposta é reiniciar o jogo.

--É difícil?
( ) Basta assisitr o jogo
( ) Qualquer um zera
( ) Interessante, as vezes difícil
( ) Dificil
(X) É necessário morrer (de verdade) pra zerar
Em seu nível mais difícil, morrer é muito mais fácil do que você imagina.

--Tem uma história?
( ) Não
( ) A história é quase inexistente
( ) Consegue te arrancar uma lágrima ou duas
(X) Dava pra fazer um livro/filme
( ) Te deixa cativado e sem palavras
A narrativa de um mundo semi-dominado por zumbis é clássica e geralmente não dá pra se desenvolver muito. No entanto esse jogo é recheado de detalhes e diálogos que proporcionam uma profunda imersão.

--Audio, músicas

( ) Irritante e Incoerente
( ) Melhor deixar sem som
(X) Neutro
( ) Otima trilha sonora
( ) Vale a pena comprar a soundtrack
A trilha sonora só se apresenta momentos antes da aparição de algum zumbi especial - para gerar um ambiente de suspense - e nas cinematics.

--Vale a pena o investimento?
( )Nem de Graça
( )Pedi reembolso
( )Se estiver em promocao vale
( )Valor Justo
(X)Pagaria o dobro
Sou um grande fã de tudo que envolve apocalipse zumbi, sendo assim, pagaria o dobro e ainda compraria para meus amigos jogarem comigo.

Se você, assim como eu, gosta de FPS, Cooperativo-Online e administração de recursos para sobrevivência, esse jogo é COMPRA CERTA!

Tudo é melhor com os amigos: Se você tiver 3 amigos, não pense duas vezes antes de comprar esse jogo.
